description: Displayed in the 'Conntent Map' section of About page.
Displayed in the 'Wireframes' section of About page.
Site is divided into the Home, Featured,About, and Contact pages.
I used Font Awesome icons for my social icons on the Contact page. I used Glyphs to display the copyright symbol Â©.
I included some fun gif to make it more welcoming for the site on the Contact, Thank You, and Admin page.
I created and embedded Spotify's playlist the specified for this project. It is in the footer of About, Featured, Contact pages.

The Featured page uses a slideshow to displays the latest projects section. I also uses a carousel to display the graphic design and wireframes images. Both slideshow and carousel is controlled by left and right arrows.
I used external custom fonts from Google fonts (Nimbus Sans and Canela). I included fonts package in the project public folder.
I used this concept throughout the website such as top navigation, footer, featured section, and mobile screen size.
Portfolio website build with Jekyll, Gulp, React, and deploy with GH-Pages
The main instance of SVG element is the logo of the website.
On the Contact page, the form requires that a person fills out at their first name, last name, a valid email, and some feedback messages before they are allowed to click the submit button.
When someone fills out the contact form on the Contact page, their information is stored in a Mongodb Atlas database. This information can only be seen on the Admin page.

This site has an Admin page where you can see all the emails that have been collected. There is a required username and password to be admitted to this page. The credentials are username=anhnguyen and password=seisfinalproject.

On the Featured page, all information of latest projects and other codding projects sections are stored in a same JSON file (projects.json). I also used JSON on the Walkthrough section in About page to show all requirement for this website.
